original_text: You will take some of the bull's blood and put it on the four horns on the top of the altar. Also put some blood on the corners of the middle part of the altar. And put some on the border around the edge of the altar. Do that to make the altar clean and pure for me.
korean_text: 네가 그 피를 가져다가 제단의 네 뿔과 아래층 네 모퉁이와 사방 가장자리에 발라 속죄하여 제단을 정결하게 하고

sentences.original_text: You will take some of the bull's blood
sentences.korean_translation: 당신은 황소의 피를 일부 가져올 것입니다

sentences.original_text: and put it on the four horns
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그 피를 네 개의 뿔에 바를 것입니다

sentences.original_text: on the top of the altar
Also put some blood on the corners
of the middle part of the altar
And put some on the border
around the edge of the altar
Do that to make the altar clean
